text: PEOPLE, PLACES AND SPACES and given permission. The development of design codes should be discussed with the council and should be subject to early engagement with local communities, to ensure that proposals are appropriate to the local context and can effectively support the delivery of new development. Tower Hamlets Local Plan 157 PEOPLE, PLACES AND SPACES BACK TO POLICIES 158 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES Policy PS2 Tall buildings 1. Within Tower Hamlets, a tall building is defined as one which is 30m or more in height measured as the height above ground level to the uppermost part of the structure.
